name: vlc
title: VLC
description: Seamlessly control VLC Media Player from Raycast. Play, pause, skip tracks, adjust volume, seek, toggle fullscreen, and moreâ€”all from your keyboard. Requires VLC's HTTP interface enabled.
author: kud

commands.name: next
commands.title: Next
commands.subtitle: Skip to next track
commands.description: Play the next track in the playlist.

commands.name: unmute
commands.title: Unmute/Reset Volume
commands.subtitle: Restore audio output
commands.description: Unmute the audio output / Reset the volume.

commands.name: eject
commands.title: Eject
commands.subtitle: Remove current media
commands.description: Eject the current media from VLC.

commands.name: open
commands.title: Open
commands.subtitle: Load media file with optional subtitles
commands.description: Open a video in VLC, optionally with a subtitle file.

commands.name: open-vlsub
commands.title: Open VLsub
commands.subtitle: Launch subtitle download extension
commands.description: Trigger the VLsub extension in VLC.

commands.name: set-volume
commands.title: Set Volume
commands.subtitle: Set audio volume to specific percentage
commands.description: Set VLC volume to a specific percentage (0-125%).

preferences.name: vlc_password
preferences.title: VLC HTTP Password
preferences.description: Password for VLC remote HTTP interface.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
